basics.name: Joe Oliveira
basics.label: 永遠の痛み
basics.summary:
As a seasoned IT professional with over a decade of hands-on experience, I bring extensive expertise in desktop engineering, systems administration, and technical support. Throughout my career, I’ve built a reputation for efficiently diagnosing and resolving complex technical issues, ensuring minimal downtime and peak performance for clients. 

One of my proudest achievements has been collaborating with cross-functional teams to tackle recurring software challenges, ultimately reducing system downtime and boosting operational efficiency. Previously, in a sales role, I consistently ranked among the top 10 performers company-wide, exceeding monthly targets by an impressive 32% on average.

I possess a strong foundation in project management, network administration, disaster recovery, and systems administration, with a deep proficiency in .NET and multiple programming languages. Additionally, my understanding of industry-standard software and utilities enables me to implement innovative solutions that improve productivity and reliability. 

Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn (https://www.linkedin.com/in/joe-oliveira) or email (joeoliveira89@gmail.com) if you’d like to discuss IT solutions, brainstorm on tech challenges, or just chat about the vast lore of industry acronyms.

interests.name: Exploring the outdoors: From hiking trails to camping under the stars, I love connecting with nature and recharging in the open air.
Rock Climbing: Testing limits and building resilience, one climb at a time.
Music Enthusiast: Whether it’s feeling every beat or discovering new genres, music fuels my creativity.
Culinary Adventures: Cooking and baking are my outlets for creativity, and I’m always experimenting with new recipes.
Gaming: Both playing and creating games—constantly inspired by the worlds, mechanics, and stories within.
Cinema Lover: I’m a movie buff at heart, always ready to dive into everything from indie films to big blockbusters.
Foodie: Exploring new cuisines and flavors is my kind of adventure.
Seeking New Challenges: Life’s too short not to push the boundaries—whether it’s learning, creating, or exploring.

work.summary: Responsible for all levels of the business. Maintained store front while repairing customer devices following the break-fix methods in a timely manner. Handled multiple small business IT needs including but not limited to, Office 365, Active Directory, POS, server and workstation setup, and repairs.

Created, managed, and maintained website and e-commerce platform, generating significant weekly sales. Installed video monitoring systems to comply with OLCC guidelines and assisted in POS software development (primarily C# & JavaScript).

Performed break-fix repairs on servers, POS systems, and self-checkout units across over 50 locations in Oregon. On-call 24/7 for urgent repairs. Developed a scheduling system for engineers and assisted with knowledge base updates, surpassing performance metrics.

Implemented new sales strategies and conducted training to improve sales metrics. Maintained a high repair rate of 75% devices within 24 hours and consistently ranked in the top sales company-wide. Managed technical support tickets via Apple GSM & GSX.
Oversaw 70+ employees and 30 locations across Oregon, Washington, and California. Expanded franchise operations, managed inventory, and led hiring and training initiatives to drive business growth.

volunteer.position: Camp Counselor and Climbing Tower Instructor
volunteer.summary: Supported troops during summer camp and taught climbing lessons and safety protocols on-site.
Contributed during the Christmas season by boxing, loading, and shipping gifts to underprivileged children.

awards.title: No awards yet, but I'm always hopeful :)
